attributes.title: Constant Calls
attributes.review:
I had to enter in my number to create this account. Now am receiving a plethora of phone calls about a variety of things, none of which I want to hear.
Additionally, I cannot support anything made, operated, or associated with Donald Trump or his family.
Little Donald should remove this app immediately from the app store as I personally found it useless, demanding information that I didnâ€™t particularly want to enter, and also since it an app entirely dedicated to the campaigns of an impeached president; I found this overall highly disappointing (which was not unexpected).
I must reiterate on how I cannot support something made by Donald. He is a disgusting man and this app reflects his narcissistic behavior. There is no use for a campaign app; there are a number of other platforms that could be used for finding campaigns to not show up to.

If I could give this a 0-star rating, I would.

And I think my phone has a virus now. Not to mention I always fell like my camera is on and recording me, also when I went to Verizon to get my phone fixed, they Said that something seriously

attributes.title: This app killed my frog
attributes.review: This app is TERRIBLE and has caused great sorrow in my family. I downloaded it to see what all the boomers were going crazy about. Honestly, I donâ€™t understand the hype. And ALSO! When I first opened the app my phone started seizing or something! The screen flashing with images of a scary orange man! I was scared out of my boots! I had my pet frog on my head as I always do and the moment he saw that scary man he too was terrified! He was so scared that he leap off my head and tragically landed on my cat, who ate him. My family is HEARTBROKEN and whoever that scary orange man is needs to GET OFF THIS PLANET! Rip Noodles you will be missed.

attributes.title: I have a dream...
attributes.review: I... an 18 year old woman was looking foward to see and experience these great app. I had a dream I could Go and find love in the trump world. I had a dream the app would work...I HAD A DREAM I could potentially download it. But it took 7 hours, and when I opened the app it crashed up on my feet. I will be lying if I said I didnâ€™t cry. Because  i did... I wanted to see daddy trump in action. But I left with a broken heart  full of tears to give. I am disappointed and wonâ€™t vote for him no more. I had a dream of voting for you...but your app destroyed it as well as it destroyed my soul. Good bye daddy trump you wonâ€™t be missed.
